contentrichtext.text: This is a '''List of music styles'''. Music can be described in terms of many [[music genre|genres]] and styles. Classifications are often arbitrary and closely related forms often overlap. Larger genres and styles comprise more specific sub-catagories. This list is split into four separate pages: *[[List of styles of music: A–F]]                             *[[List of styles of music: G–M]]                             *[[List of styles of music: N–R]]                            *[[List of styles of music: S–Z]] ==See also== * [[Genealogy of musical genres]] {{Western music genres}} [[Category:Lists of music genres| ]]
